architectural_notes: Caffeine draft preview may inject internal draft-script.js (origin whitelist) which can prevent React app from mounting if editor-related dependencies are loaded.
known_issues: Caffeine draft preview error: draft-editor:error disallowed origin (https://just-olive-eim-draft.caffeine.xyz) causing only static hero HTML to render.
Intermittent Caffeine platform-level draft deployment failures ('Deployment error') may require clean rebuild/redeploy or retry.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the deployment documentation to include an explicit “clean rebuild and redeploy” procedure that clears local build artifacts/caches and then rebuilds + redeploys the project, including a short troubleshooting section for intermittent Caffeine draft deployment failures (e.g., retry guidance) and the known draft preview issue showing `draft-editor:error disallowed origin: https://just-olive-eim-draft.caffeine.xyz`. All user-facing text in the docs must be in English.
